name: 30 days to Defence
description:
Enemies besiege your castle, my lord! At your disposal there is a small supply of gold, which is replenished thanks to the killed enemies, you can spend gold as your heart desires, hire knights or archers, shoot down enemy catapults by throwing stones, or repair your castle, which is increasingly crumbling under the onslaught of villains. One mercy, enemies cannot attack you forever, only 30 days, is this a lot for such a great ruler?

30 days to Defense - protection of the castle in which the player has to save money falling from enemies and buy troops on them, improve or apply some magic. In the game there is a change of day and night, in the dark, enemies are reviving and raids are becoming more and more difficult to beat them off, in order to live 30 days and protect your castle, you have to frantically click on the icons, collect coins until they disappear and monitor the status of your castle.



Game Features:
- difficulty
- Castle Defense
- Purchase improvements
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Responsive management
